title: Crab & Prawn Linguine

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, thin peelings of skin and juice
200 g crabmeat, white, brown or mixture
70 g rocket, plus extra for serving

preparations.content: Place lemon peel in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place water, 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp oil in mixing bowl then bring to the boil <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Add pasta and cook <b>select time according to packet instructions/100°C//speed 1<b>. Using simmering basket, drain pasta well under cold running water then set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add prawns and oil then sauté <b>2 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add crème fraîche, crabmeat, rocket, salt, pepper and reserved chopped lemon peel then heat <b>3 min/90°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add drained linguine and lemon juice then stir through <b>2 min/80°C//speed <b>. Serve scattered with toasted pine nuts and garnished with rocket.

hintsAndTricks: Toast your own pine nuts in a frying pan over a high heat, stirring constantly. Once golden brown, transfer to a bowl and set aside.
